## Block.moveInputBefore() method

Move a named input to a different location on this block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
moveInputBefore(name: string, refName: string | null): void;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

The name of the input to move.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

refName


</td><td>

string \| null


</td><td>
